articles.description: Liverpool take their summer spending to about £170m with the signing of left-back Milos Kerkez from Bournemouth in a deal worth £40m.
articles.title: Milos Kerkez: Who is 'brilliant' left-back joining Liverpool from Bournemouth for £40m?

articles.description: Jofra Archer is named in England's squad for the second Test against India at Edgbaston, putting the fast bowler in line for a first Test appearance in more than four years.
articles.title: Jofra Archer in England squad for second Test against India at Edgbaston

articles.description: Birmingham City host Ipswich Town to start the new Championship season on Friday, 8 August before Wrexham visit Southampton a day later.
articles.title: Championship fixtures 2025-26: Birmingham City host Ipswich Town to start season

articles.description: All the latest transfer news including updates as Arsenal agree a deal to sign Christian Norgaard from Brentford.
articles.title: Transfer news: Updates, Norgaard latest plus gossip

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Inter Milan vs River Plate in the FIFA Club World Cup
articles.title: Inter Milan vs River Plate: FIFA Club World Cup stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Ireland's Dan Sheehan will captain the British and Irish Lions in their opening game on Australian soil against the Western Force on Saturday.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Sheehan to captain against Australian side Western Force

articles.description: Goalkeeper Ederson says his future is at Manchester City and says reports linking him with a move away are "99% fake news".
articles.title: Ederson: Man City goalkeeper says his future is at the club

articles.description: Knowing what type of shot to play and when is key to winning matches - so too is court positioning as Carlos Alcaraz shows.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Carlos Alcaraz and the art of court positioning

articles.description: The racing commentator, speaking for the first time since the murder of his wife and two daughters, says their love has helped sustain him through grief.
articles.title: My wife and daughters left behind a legacy of love, John Hunt tells BBC

articles.description: Australia are skittled out for just 180 against West Indies but hit back late on as 14 wickets fall on a chaotic opening day of the first Test in Bridgetown.
articles.title: West Indies v Australia: Tourists out for 180 but hit back late on chaotic opening day
